description.brazilian: Fuja com os quatro jogadores na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Escape with all four players
description.french: Échappez-vous avec les quatre joueurs au complet.
description.german: Entkommen Sie mit allen vier Spielern
description.italian: Scappa con tutti e 4 i giocatori.
description.japanese: 4人のプレイヤー全員で脱出する
description.polish: Ucieknij ze wszystkim czterema graczami
description.russian: Спаслись все 4 игрока.
description.spanish: Escapa con los cuatro jugadores.

description.brazilian: Chegue ao helicóptero de evacuação com 1:30 de sobra na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Reach the exfil chopper with 1 minute and 30 seconds or more remaining on the clock.
description.french: Atteignez l'hélicoptère d'extraction au moins 1 minute 30 avant la fin du temps imparti.
description.german: Erreichen Sie den Evakuierungshubschrauber mit mindestens 1 Minute 30 Sekunden Restzeit auf der Uhr
description.italian: Raggiungi l'elicottero per l'estrazione quando manca almeno 1 minuto e 30 secondi.
description.japanese: 残り時間を1分30秒以上残して回収ヘリの元に到達する
description.polish: Dotrzyj do śmigłowca ewakuacyjnego, kiedy do końca czasu pozostało co najmniej 1m 30s.
description.russian: Добраться до вертолета с запасом времени более 1:30.
description.spanish: Llega al helicóptero de extracción cuando queden 1 minuto y 30 segundos o más en el reloj.

description.brazilian: Fuja na primeira vez na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Escape 1st time
description.french: Échappez-vous la première fois.
description.german: Entkommen Sie zum ersten Mal
description.italian: Fuggi per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めて生還する
description.polish: Ucieknij po raz pierwszy
description.russian: Спаситесь в первый раз.
description.spanish: Escapa la primera vez.

description.brazilian: Complete todos os desafios de Extinção e fuja na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Complete all Extinction challenges and escape.
description.french: Terminez tous les défis Extinction et échappez-vous.
description.german: Schließen Sie alle Extinktion-Herausforderungen ab und fliehen Sie
description.italian: Completa tutte le sfide Estinzione e fuggi.
description.japanese: Extinctionのチャレンジをすべてクリアして脱出する
description.polish: Zalicz wszystkie wyzwania w trybie Wyginięcie i ucieknij.
description.russian: Выполнить все испытания в выживании и спастись.
description.spanish: Completa todos los desafíos de Extinción y escapa.

description.brazilian: Chegue à cabana na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Make it to the cabin.
description.french: Atteignez la cabane.
description.german: Gelangen Sie zur Hütte
description.italian: Raggiungi la baita.
description.japanese: 小屋に到達する
description.polish: Dotrzyj do chaty.
description.russian: Доберитесь до коттеджа
description.spanish: Llega hasta la cabaña.

description.brazilian: Chegou à cidade na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Made it to the city.
description.french: Rejoignez la ville.
description.german: Gelangen Sie in die Stadt
description.italian: Raggiungi la città.
description.japanese: 都市へ到達する
description.polish: Dotrzyj do miasta.
description.russian: Вы добрались до города
description.spanish: Llega hasta la ciudad.

description.brazilian: Obtenha 50 baixas com cerca elétrica e armadilhas de fogo num jogo na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Get 50 kills with the electric fence and fire traps in a single game.
description.french: Tuez 50 ennemis avec la barrière électrique et les pièges incendiaires en une seule partie.
description.german: Erreichen Sie 50 Abschüsse per Elektrozaun und Brandfalle in einem Spiel
description.italian: Esegui 50 uccisioni utilizzando recinti elettrici e trappole infuocate in una sola partita.
description.japanese: 一度のゲーム中に電気トラップとファイヤートラップでエイリアンを50体倒す
description.polish: Zabij w jednej grze 50x za pomocą ogrodzeń pod napięciem oraz pułapek ognistych.
description.russian: Убейте 50 пришельцев ловушками в одной игре.
description.spanish: Mata a 50 alienígenas con las vallas eléctricas y las trampas de fuego en una partida.

description.brazilian: Recupere 40 itens em um só jogo na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Scavenge 40 items in a single game.
description.french: Récupérez 40 objets en une seule partie.
description.german: Plündern Sie 40 Objekte in einem Spiel
description.italian: Raccogli 40 oggetti in una sola partita.
description.japanese: 1回のプレイ中に アイテムを40個拾う
description.polish: Znajdź 40 przedmiotów w jednej grze.
description.russian: Найдите 40 предметов в одной игре.
description.spanish: Recoge 40 objetos en una partida.

description.brazilian: Fuja usando uma relíquia na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Escape using a relic.
description.french: Échappez-vous en utilisant une relique.
description.german: Entkommen Sie mit einem Relikt
description.italian: Fuggi utilizzando una reliquia.
description.japanese: レリックを使って脱出する
description.polish: Ucieknij, używając artefaktu.
description.russian: Спаситесь в игре с использованием артефакта.
description.spanish: Escapa usando una reliquia.

description.brazilian: Termine 20 rodadas em Proteção.
description.english: Reach round 20 in Safeguard.
description.french: Atteignez la vingtième manche dans Protection.
description.german: Erreichen Sie Runde 20 in Widerstand
description.italian: Raggiungi il round 20 in Salvaguardia.
description.japanese: Safeguardで20ラウンドを達成する
description.polish: Dotrzyj do rundy 20 w Straży.
description.russian: Пройдите 20 раундов в Мерах безопасности
description.spanish: Llega a la ronda 20 en Salvaguarda.

description.brazilian: Obtenha acesso à área do complexo em Nightfall na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Gain access to the Compound area in Nightfall in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Accédez au complexe dans Nightfall en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Verschaffen Sie sich Zugang zum Anlagenbereich auf Normal oder Hardcore in Nightfall
description.italian: Accedi all'area del complesso in Nightfall a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーもしくはハードコアのNightfallで施設エリアへ到達する
description.polish: Na Nightfall dotrzyj do strefy składu na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Доберитесь до компаунда в Nightfall на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Consigue acceder a la zona del complejo en Anochecer en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Obtenha acesso à área das instalações em Nightfall na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Gain access to the Facility in Nightfall in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Accédez à l'entrepôt dans Nightfall en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Verschaffen Sie sich Zugang zur Einrichtung auf Normal oder Hardcore in Nightfall
description.italian: Accedi alla base in Nightfall a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーもしくはハードコアのNightfallで施設へ到達する
description.polish: Na Nightfall dotrzyj do ośrodka na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Добраться до базы в Nightfall на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Consigue acceder a la instalación en Anochecer en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Mate o reprodutor pela primeira vez em Nightfall na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Kill the Breeder for the first time in Nightfall in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Éliminez la génitrice pour la première fois dans Nightfall en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Besiegen Sie den Brüter zum ersten Mal auf Normal oder Hardcore in Nightfall
description.italian: Uccidi l'Incubatore per la prima volta in Nightfall a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーもしくはハードコアのNightfallで初めてブリーダーを倒す
description.polish: Na Nightfall zabij Reproduktora po raz pierwszy na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Убить Паука в Nightfall в первый раз на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Mata al reproductor por primera vez en Anochecer en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Mate o reprodutor em menos de 5 minutos em Nightfall na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Kill the Breeder in less than 5 minutes in Nightfall in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Éliminez la génitrice en moins de 5 minutes dans Nightfall en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Besiegen Sie den Brüter in weniger als 5 Minuten auf Normal oder Hardcore in Nightfall
description.italian: Uccidi l'Incubatore in meno di 5 minuti in Nightfall a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーもしくはハードコアのNightfallで 5分以内にブリーダーを倒す
description.polish: Na Nightfall zabij Reproduktora w mniej niż 5 min na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Убить Паука в Nightfall меньше чем за 5 минут на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Mata al reproductor en menos de 5 minutos en Anochecer en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Mate 50 criptoides com a arma Venom-X em Nightfall na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Kill 50 Cryptids with the Venom-X weapon in Nightfall in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Éliminez 50 cryptides avec le Venom-X dans Nightfall en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Schalten Sie 50 Kryptide mit der Venom-X auf Normal oder Hardcore in Nightfall aus
description.italian: Uccidi 50 Criptidi con l'arma Venom-X in Nightfall a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: Nightfallのレギュラーもしくは ハードコアで クリプティッド50匹を Venom-Xで倒す
description.polish: Na Nightfall zabij 50 Kryptydów za pomocą Venom-X na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Убить 50 криптидов в Nightfall используя Venom-X на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Mata a 50 críptidos con el arma Venom-X en Anochecer en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Complete todos os desafios e mate o reprodutor em Nightfall na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Complete all challenges and kill the Breeder in Nightfall in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Terminez tous les défis et éliminez la génitrice dans Nightfall en diff. 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Meistern Sie alle Herausforderungen, besiegen Sie den Brüter auf Normal oder Hardcore in Nightfall
description.italian: Completa tutte le sfide e uccidi l'Incubatore in Nightfall a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーもしくは ハードコアで Nightfallの 全てのチャレンジを達成し 全てのブリーダーを倒す
description.polish: Na Nightfall ukończ wszystkie wyzwania i zabij Reproduktora na poz. Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Выполните все испытания и убейте Паука в Nightfall на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Completa todos los desafíos y mata al reproductor en Anochecer en normal o extremo.

displayName.japanese: サバイバルスロットル

description.brazilian: Mate o reprodutor usando uma relíquia em Nightfall na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Kill the Breeder while using a Relic in Nightfall in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Éliminez la génitrice en utilisant une relique dans Nightfall en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Erledigen Sie den Brüter, während Sie ein Relikt auf Normal oder Hardcore in Nightfall benutzen
description.italian: Uccidi l'Incubatore usando una Reliquia in Nightfall a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーもしくはハードコアのNightfallで レリック使用中にブリーダーを倒す
description.polish: Na Nightfall zabij Reproduktora korzystając z artefaktu na poz. Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Убить Паука в Nightfall используя реликвию на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Mata al reproductor usando una reliquia en Anochecer en normal o extremo.

displayName.japanese: ファントムエクスターミネーター

description.brazilian: Mate 5 fantasmas em uma partida na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Kill 5 Phantoms in one game in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Éliminez 5 fantômes en une partie en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Schalten Sie 5 Phantom-Aliens auf Normal oder Hardcore in einem Spiel aus
description.italian: Uccidi 5 Fantasmi in una sola partita a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーもしくは ハードコアで ファントムを5匹倒す
description.polish: Zabij 5 Duchów w jednej grze na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Убить 5 фантомов в одной игре на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Mata a 5 fantasmas en una partida en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Mate um rinoceronte só com uma pistola em Nightfall na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Kill a Rhino with only a pistol in Nightfall in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Tuez un Rhino avec uniquement un pistolet dans Nightfall en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Schalten Sie einen Rhino nur mit einer Pistole auf Normal oder Hardcore in Nightfall aus
description.italian: Uccidi un Rino a colpi di pistola in Nightfall a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: Nightfallのレギュラーもしくは ハードコアで ライノをハンドガンのみで倒す
description.polish: Na Nightfall zabij Rhino za pomocą pistoletu na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Убить Носорога в Nightfall используя только пистолет на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Mata a un rinoceronte con solo una pistola en Anochecer en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Encontre todas as informações escondidas em Nightfall.
description.english: Find all the intel hidden in Nightfall.
description.french: Trouvez tous les renseignements cachés dans Nightfall.
description.german: Finden Sie alle versteckten Geheimdaten in Nightfall
description.italian: Trova tutte le informazioni nascoste in Nightfall.
description.japanese: Nightfalｌで全てのインテルを発見する
description.polish: Na Nightfall zbierz wszystkie dane wywiadu.
description.russian: Найдены все данные, спрятанные в Nightfall.
description.spanish: Encuentra toda la información oculta en Anochecer.

description.brazilian: Complete o desafio Olha o XP! e destrua uma colmeia no pacote para download Onslaught.
description.english: Complete the Egg-Stra XP challenge and then destroy a hive in the Onslaught DLC package.
description.french: Terminez le défi EXP supplémentaire, puis détruisez un nid dans le pack de DLC Ongslaught.
description.german: Beenden Sie die Ei-nzigartige EP-Herausforderung und zerstören Sie dann ein Nest im Onslaught-Pack
description.italian: Completa la sfida Chi ha voglia di frittata? e distruggi un alveare nel pacchetto mappa Onslaught.
description.japanese: エッグストラXPチャレンジを達成し ONSLAUGHT DLCパックのすべてのハイヴを破壊する
description.polish: Ukończ wyzwanie Ale jaja! PD! i zniszcz gniazdo na DLC Onslaught.
description.russian: Выполните испытание Опыт за яйца и уничтожте улей в наборе карт Onslaught.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío Muchos PX y destruye una colmena en el paquete de contenido Onslaught.

description.brazilian: Chegue à área de carga em Mayday em Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Reach the cargo area in Mayday in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Atteignez la zone du cargo dans Mayday en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Erreichen Sie den Frachtbereich auf Normal oder Hardcore in Mayday
description.italian: Raggiungi l'area di carico in Mayday a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで Maydayの 貨物エリアに到達する
description.polish: Dotrzyj do strefy cargo na Mayday na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Доберитесь до грузовой площадки в Mayday на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Llega a la zona de carga en Mayday en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Chegue ao convés superior em Mayday em Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Reach the top deck in Mayday in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Atteignez le pont supérieur dans Mayday en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Erreichen Sie das oberste Deck auf Normal oder Hardcore in Mayday
description.italian: Raggiungi il ponte superiore in Mayday a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで Maydayの  トップデッキに到達する
description.polish: Dotrzyj na górny poziom na Mayday na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Доберитесь до верхней палубы в Mayday на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Llega a la cubierta superior en Mayday en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Mate o Kraken pela primeira vez em Mayday em Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Kill the Kraken for the first time in Mayday in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Tuez le Kraken pour la première fois dans Mayday en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Besiegen Sie den Kraken zum ersten Mal auf Normal oder Hardcore in Mayday
description.italian: Uccidi il Kraken per la prima volta in Mayday a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで Maydayの クラーケンを初めて倒す
description.polish: Zabij Krakena po raz pierwszy na Mayday na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Убейте Кракена в Mayday в первый раз на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Mata al kraken en Mayday por primera vez en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Mate o Kraken usando uma relíquia em Mayday em Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Kill the Kraken using a Relic in Mayday in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Tuez le Kraken en utilisant une relique dans Mayday en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Besiegen Sie den Kraken mit einem Relikt auf Normal oder Hardcore in Mayday
description.italian: Uccidi il Kraken usando una Reliquia in Mayday a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで レリックを使用して Maydayの クラーケンを倒す
description.polish: Zabij krakena używając artefaktu na Mayday na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Убить Кракена в Mayday в игре с реликвией на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Mata al kraken en Mayday usando una reliquia en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Complete todos os desafios e mate o Kraken em Mayday em Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Complete all Challenges and kill the Kraken in Mayday in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Terminez tous les défis et tuez le Kraken dans Mayday en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Beenden Sie alle Herausforderungen und besiegen Sie den Kraken auf Normal oder Hardcore in Mayday
description.italian: Completa tutte le sfide e uccidi il Kraken in Mayday a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで Maydayの 全てのチャレンジを達成し クラーケンを倒す
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie wyzwania i zabij Krakena na Mayday na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Выполнить все испытания и убить Кракена в Mayday на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Completa todos los desafíos y mata al kraken en Mayday en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Encontre todas as informações em Mayday.
description.english: Find all of the Intel in Mayday.
description.french: Trouvez tous les renseignements dans Mayday.
description.german: Finden Sie alle Geheimdaten in Mayday
description.italian: Trova tutte le informazioni in Mayday.
description.japanese: Maydayの全ての インテルを発見する
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie dane wywiadu na Mayday.
description.russian: Найти все данные в Mayday.
description.spanish: Encuentra toda la información en Mayday.

description.brazilian: Destrua 15 Torretas Semeadoras em uma partida em Mayday em Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Kill 15 Seeder Turrets in one game in Mayday in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Éliminez 15 tourelles de Piégeurs en une partie dans Mayday en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Besiegen Sie 15 Säer-Geschütze in einem Spiel auf Normal oder Hardcore in Mayday
description.italian: Elimina 15 torrette di Seminatore in una sola partita in Mayday a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで Maydayの シーダーターレットを 15体倒す
description.polish: Zabij 15 zasianych w jednej grze na Mayday na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Убить 15 турелей Спорника в одной игре в Mayday на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Destruye 15 torretas de sembradores en Mayday en una partida en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Use armadilha hipnotizante para tornar um rinoceronte em aliado em Mayday em Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Use a hypno trap to turn a Rhino friendly in Mayday in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Utilisez un piège Hypno pour faire d'un Rhino un allié dans Mayday en diff. 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Machen Sie einen Rhino mit einer Hypno-Falle auf Normal oder Hardcore zum Verbündeten in Mayday
description.italian: Usa una trappola Hypno per rendere un Rino tuo alleato in Mayday a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: Maydayの レギュラーかハードコアで 催眠トラップを使用し ライノを味方にする
description.polish: Użyj hipno-pułapki by oswoić Rhino na Mayday na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Используйте гипно-ловушку чтобы подчинить Носорога в Mayday на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Usa una trampa Hipno en Mayday para convertir a un rinoceronte en aliado en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Complete o desafio Olha o XP! e destrua a colmeia no pacote de conteúdo para baixar Devastation.
description.english: Complete the Egg-Stra XP challenge and then destroy a hive in the Devastation DLC package.
description.french: Terminez le défi EXP supplémentaire puis détruisez un nid dans le pack de cartes Devastation.
description.german: Beenden Sie die Ei-nzigartige EP-Herausforderung und zerstören Sie dann ein Nest im Devastation-Pack
description.italian: Completa la sfida Chi ha voglia di frittata? e distruggi un alveare nel pacchetto Devastation.
description.japanese: Devastationマップパック で全てエッグストラXP チャレンジを達成し ハイヴを破壊する
description.polish: Ukończ wyzwanie Ale jaja! PD! i zniszcz gniazdo w Devastation.
description.russian: Выполните испытание Опыт за яйца и уничтожте улей в наборе карт Devastation.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío "Muchos PX" y destruye una colmena en el paquete de contenido Devastation.

description.brazilian: Construir todos os projetos em Mayday com sucesso em Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Successfully build all of the Schematics in Mayday in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Reconstituez toutes les compositions dans Mayday en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Realisieren Sie erfolgreich alle Baupläne auf Normal oder Hardcore in Mayday
description.italian: Crea tutti i progetti in Mayday a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: Maydayの レギュラーかハードコアで 全ての設計図で アイテムを作成する
description.polish: Zbuduj wszystkie przedmioty z planów na Mayday na poziomie trudności Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Успешно постройте предметы по всем схемам в Mayday на средней или харкдорной сложности.
description.spanish: Construye todos los planos en Mayday en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Atravesse o primeiro portão em Awakening na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Get past the first gate in Awakening in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Passez la première porte dans Awakening en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Kommen Sie in Awakening auf Normal oder Hardcore am ersten Tor vorbei.
description.italian: Supera il primo varco in Awakening a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで Awakening 最初のゲートを 通過する
description.polish: Przejdź przez pierwszą bramę na Awakening na poziomie Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Пройдите первые врата в Awakening на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Supera la primera puerta en Awakening en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Estenda a ponte em Awakening em dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Extend the bridge in Awakening in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Agrandissez le pont dans Awakening en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Fahren Sie die Brücke aus auf Normal oder Hardcore in Awakening
description.italian: Allunga il ponte in Awakening a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで Awakening 内のブリッジを 展開する
description.polish: Rozłóż most w Awakening na poziomie Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Выдвиньте мост в Awakening на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Despliega el puente en Awakening en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Escape de Awakening pela primeira vez na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Escape Awakening for the first time in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Échappez-vous d'Awakening pour la première fois en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Entkommen Sie zum ersten Mal auf Normal oder Hardcore in Awakening
description.italian: Fuggi in Awakening per la prima volta a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで Awakening を初めて脱出する
description.polish: Ukończ Awakening po raz pierwszy na poziomie Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Спаситесь в Awakening в первый раз на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Escapa de Awakening por primera vez en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Fuja de Awakening usando duas Relíquias na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Escape Awakening using two Relics in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Échappez-vous d'Awakening en utilisant deux reliques en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Entkommen Sie mit zwei Relikten auf Normal oder Hardcore in Awakening
description.italian: Fuggi in Awakening usando due Reliquie a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで レリックを2つ使い Awakening を脱出する
description.polish: Ukończ Awakening z dwoma artefaktami na poziomie Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Спаситесь в Awakening используя две реликвии на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Escapa de Awakening usando dos reliquias en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Complete todos os desafios e escape de Awakening na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Complete all Challenges and escape Awakening in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Terminez tous les défis et échappez-vous d'Awakening en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Beenden Sie alle Herausforderungen und entkommen Sie auf Normal oder Hardcore in Awakening
description.italian: Completa tutte le sfide e fuggi in Awakening a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで 全てのチャレンジを達成し Awakening を脱出する
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie wyzwania i Awakening na poziomie Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Выполните все испытания и спаситесь в Awakening на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Completa todos los desafíos y escapa de Awakening en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Encontre todas as inteligências em Awakening.
description.english: Find all of the Intel in Awakening.
description.french: Trouvez tous les renseignements dans Awakening.
description.german: Finden Sie alle Geheimdaten in Awakening
description.italian: Trova tutte le informazioni in Awakening.
description.japanese: Awakeningで全てのインテルを発見
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie dane wywiadu na Awakening.
description.russian: Найдите все данные в Awakening.
description.spanish: Encuentra toda la información en Awakening.

description.brazilian: Mate um Gárgula com o Vanguard em Awakening na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Kill a Gargoyle with the Vanguard in Awakening in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Éliminez une Gargouille avec un Vanguard dans Awakening en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Schalten Sie einen Wasserspeier mit der Vanguard auf Normal oder Hardcore in Awakening aus.
description.italian: Uccidi un Gargoyle con il Vanguard in Awakening a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアで ヴァンガードを使用し ガーゴイルを倒す
description.polish: Na Awakening zabij Gargulca za pomocą Vanguard na poziomie Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Убейте Горгулью Вангардом в Awakening на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Mata a una gárgola con el Vanguard en Awakening en normal o extremo.

description.brazilian: Complete o desafio "Olha o XP!" e escaneie um obelisco no pacote de conteúdo para baixar Invasion.
description.english: Complete the Egg-Stra XP challenge and then scan an obelisk in the Invasion DLC package.
description.french: Terminez le défi EXP bonus, puis détruisez un obélisque dans le pack de DLC Invasion.
description.german: Beenden Sie die Ei-nzigartige EP-Herausforderung und scannen Sie einen Obelisken im Invasion-Pack
description.italian: Completa la sfida Chi ha voglia di frittata? e scansiona un Obelisco nel pacchetto Invasion.
description.japanese: Invasion DLCで エッグストラXP チャレンジを達成し オベリスクを スキャンする
description.polish: Ukończ wyzwanie Ale jaja! PD! i przeskanuj obelisk w zestawie DLC Invasion.
description.russian: Выполните испытание Опыт за яйца и уничтожьте обелиск в наборе карт Invasion.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío "Muchos PX" y escanea un obelisco en el paquete de contenido Invasion.

description.brazilian: Mate 5 criptoides com a Arca acoplada a todas as armas compatíveis em Awakening em Normal\Extremo.
description.english: Kill 5 cryptids with the Ark attached to every compatible weapon in Awakening in Regular\Hardcore.
description.french: Tuez 5 aliens avec l'Arche sur toutes les armes compatibles dans Awakening en 2nde classe\Hardcore.
description.german: Schalten Sie 5 Kryptide mit jeder kompatiblen Waffe mit Arche in Awakening auf Normal/Hardcore aus.
description.italian: Uccidi 5 Criptidi con l'Ark installato su ogni arma compatibile in Awakening a Soldato/Veterano.
description.japanese: レギュラーかハードコアの Awakeningで アーク装備可能武器で クリプティッドを 5キルする
description.polish: Zabij 5x kryptydów za pomocą broni z dodatkiem Arka (Normalny\Hardcore).
description.russian: Убейте 5 криптидов с модулем Ковчег на всем совместимом оружии в Awakening на средней\хард сложн.
description.spanish: Mata a 5 críptidos con el Arca acoplada a cada arma compatible en Awakening en normal/extremo.

description.brazilian: Fuja de Awakening com cada uma das quatro classes na dificuldade Normal ou Extremo.
description.english: Escape Awakening with each of the four classes in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
description.french: Échappez-vous d'Awakening avec chacune des quatre classes en difficulté 2nde classe ou Hardcore.
description.german: Entkommen Sie mit jeder der vier Klassen auf Normal oder Hardcore in Awakening
description.italian: Fuggi in Awakening con ognuna delle quattro classi a difficoltà Soldato o Veterano.
description.japanese: 4つのクラス それぞれで レギュラーかハードコアの Awakening を脱出する
description.polish: Ukończ Awakening każdą z 4 klas na poziomie Normalnym lub Hardcore.
description.russian: Спастись в Awakening каждым из 4 классов на средней или хардкорной сложности.
description.spanish: Escapa de Awakening con cada una de las cuatro clases en normal o extremo.

description.english: Complete the final Ancestor encounter in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
Complete the final Ancestor with at least 1 relic in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
Complete every challenge and the final Ancestor encounter in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
Find all 7 story related intel files in Exodus.
Complete any outpost by activating all of the generators in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
Complete the Egg-Stra XP challenge and then activate a generator in the Nemesis DLC package.
Kill the final 3 Ancestors within 10 seconds of killing the first Ancestor in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
Hit an Ancestor with a Hypno Knife in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
Kill the final Ancestor with a relic active in Hardcore difficulty.
Kill 3 aliens with a single shot from the NX-1 Disruptor in Regular or Hardcore difficulty.
